subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Despite trading for Jason Kidd, the Mavericks struggled to make the playoffs. Now, down three games to one to the Hornets, Coach Avery Johnson’s job may be at stake.
snippet: Despite trading for Jason Kidd, the Mavericks struggled to make the playoffs. Now, down three games to one to the Hornets, Coach Avery Johnson’s job may be at stake.
